thread.title: What Recent Market Swings Can Teach You About Your Risk Tolerance

author: Ted Jenkin
title: What Recent Market Swings Can Teach You About Your Risk Tolerance
text:
(@tedjenkin) is the co-CEO and founder of oXYGen Financial, a financial advisory practice focused on the X & Y generations. He also blogs at yoursmartmoneymoves.com. The Dow Jones Industrial Average goes up 300 points. The next day, there are reports of a trade war and it goes down 700 points. The day after that, there’s […]
